summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1622, for the improvement of the alley in Block "A", Rowe's First Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between Bellevue Avenue North and the north line of said Block "A", and the alley lying north of said block "A", from Bellevue Avenue North to Melrose Avenue North, by grading the same, under Ordinance No. 17208 assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
